name: part_004
file: tmp_【3D BIRTHDAY LIVE】ARCANA - Mori Calliope's Birthday Concert! With Many Guests! [YRySeGZNzQ0]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_004.mov

scenes.description: Mori Calliope and Ookami Mio perform 'UnAlive' during Mori Calliope's 3D Birthday Live 2025.

subtitles.original: It starts with just a thought within
subtitles.english: It starts with just a thought within

subtitles.original: A wish that rode on mellow wind
subtitles.english: A wish that rode on mellow wind

subtitles.original: Begins and ends with "hello" and "goodbye"
subtitles.english: Begins and ends with "hello" and "goodbye"

subtitles.original: 今、何ができるだろう
subtitles.english: What can I do now?

subtitles.original: 何になれるだろう
subtitles.english: What can I become?

subtitles.original: 終わりには手に入れたいから
subtitles.english: Because I want to have it in the end

subtitles.original:
Vaporize those who don't begin to guess
A life so well, a part of the plan
subtitles.english:
Vaporize those who don't begin to guess
A life so well, a part of the plan

subtitles.original:
Or absorbed into a far-flung
With a forty-four in the skirt of hand
subtitles.english:
Or absorbed into a far-flung
With a forty-four in the skirt of hand

subtitles.original: 何回だって落胆したって大丈夫
subtitles.english: No matter how many times I'm discouraged, it's okay

subtitles.original: 存在しないじゃあすべてを白へ
subtitles.english: It doesn't exist, so turn everything to white

subtitles.original: 嵐へ 溶かしていくのさ
subtitles.english: Into the storm, I'll let it melt

subtitles.original: On the winds of desperation flying
subtitles.english: On the winds of desperation flying

subtitles.original: For a false world to see
subtitles.english: For a false world to see

subtitles.original: 何を求めるの 運命はもう 決められてるのに
subtitles.english:
What are you seeking? Though destiny has
already been decided...

subtitles.original: Numbing pain is numbing happiness
subtitles.english: Numbing pain is numbing happiness

subtitles.original: Something anyone can find
subtitles.english: Something anyone can find

subtitles.original: 進もう 自分のためさ
subtitles.english: Let's move forward, for my own sake

subtitles.original: Alone, it's hopeless though this soul can say "I tried"
subtitles.english: Alone, it's hopeless though this soul can say "I tried"

subtitles.original: 立ち向かうために Be born inside
subtitles.english: Be born inside, in order to face it

subtitles.original:
Recalling all the days we met
A place that I belonged and yet
subtitles.english:
Recalling all the days we met
A place that I belonged and yet

subtitles.original: My world was filled with walls of every side
subtitles.english: My world was filled with walls of every side

subtitles.original: 解き放つのは旋律 超えてゆく現実
subtitles.english: What I set free is a melody, transcending reality

subtitles.original: 無敵なの 今この一瞬は
subtitles.english: I'm invincible in this very moment

subtitles.original:
My hesitation has been hard to cold
Benefits of persecute to a story told
subtitles.english:
My hesitation has been hard to cold
Benefits of persecute to a story told

subtitles.original:
Unpleasant resentment the more you told
Give us out of the binds of stories of old
subtitles.english:
Unpleasant resentment the more you told
Give us out of the binds of stories of old

subtitles.original:
猛り 燃やし尽くしてよ 永遠に
ここから出ていくために
subtitles.english:
Rage, burn it all away, forever
In order to get out of here

subtitles.original: 檻を壊しただけ
subtitles.english: I just broke the cage

subtitles.original: On the winds of desperation flying
subtitles.english: On the winds of desperation flying

subtitles.original: For a false world to see
subtitles.english: For a false world to see

subtitles.original:
Though I may decide to fight it
Fade it is hard to hide it
subtitles.english:
Though I may decide to fight it
Fade it is hard to hide it

subtitles.original: It's always been decided for me
subtitles.english: It's always been decided for me

subtitles.original: 涙 期待 哀悼を 永遠に流してまた
subtitles.english:
Tears, expectations, mourning... letting them flow
forever once again

subtitles.original: 足りない あり得ない そこにある
subtitles.english: It's not enough, it's impossible, yet it's right there

subtitles.original: My hope 満ち足りるまで また走る
subtitles.english: Until my hope is satisfied, I'll run again

subtitles.original: 場所へと進んでゆく Be born inside
subtitles.english: Moving toward that place, be born inside

subtitles.original:
Souls divide called inner side
The dice was decisive, must have it nice
subtitles.english:
Souls divide called inner side
The dice was decisive, must have it nice

subtitles.original:
A gorgeous device to trigger entice
It's got a price
subtitles.english:
A gorgeous device to trigger entice
It's got a price

subtitles.original:
躍動しよう 私のよう
ただハートは重し 鮮やかなスペース 尊く 掃う
subtitles.english:
Let's surge, just like me
But the heart is a weight, sweep it away with dignity

subtitles.original:
They're never gonna change
Why do myself, reject any and all help
subtitles.english:
They're never gonna change
Why do myself, reject any and all help

subtitles.original:
Put all my chips and fold to help
Blood, sweat, cross-stopped thoughts invading
subtitles.english:
Put all my chips and fold to help
Blood, sweat, cross-stopped thoughts invading

subtitles.original:
Nobody's waiting
After all said and done there's nowhere left to run
subtitles.english:
Nobody's waiting
After all said and done there's nowhere left to run

subtitles.original: じゃあ R.I.P. 優しいビースト じゃないきゃな
subtitles.english: Well then, R.I.P., I've gotta be a kind beast

subtitles.original:
ビート 止めてって願うなんて異常死体
もう 魂すらも不要
subtitles.english:
Wishing for the beat to stop is like an abnormal corpse
I don't even need a soul anymore

subtitles.original: Be born inside!
subtitles.english: Be born inside!

subtitles.original:
Our world's turned once again
For that reason I still sing
subtitles.english:
Our world's turned once again
For that reason I still sing

subtitles.original:
And we've shared so many tears by now
Though I'd never change a thing
subtitles.english:
And we've shared so many tears by now
Though I'd never change a thing

subtitles.original: 泣いても笑って 死にたくなった日々も私なの
subtitles.english:
Crying, laughing, even those days when I
wanted to die, they are all me

subtitles.original: この世界にはもうこれ以上 何もない
subtitles.english: There's nothing more left in this world

subtitles.original: Numbing pain is numbing happiness
subtitles.english: Numbing pain is numbing happiness

subtitles.original: Something anyone can find
subtitles.english: Something anyone can find

subtitles.original: 進もう 自分のためさ
subtitles.english: Let's move forward, for my own sake

subtitles.original: この絶望の風の中飛んでゆく
subtitles.english: I'll fly through this wind of despair

subtitles.original: 何を求めるの 運命に抗いはしないのに
subtitles.english:
What are you seeking? Though I don't
resist destiny...

subtitles.original: そこにある幸せ 戦い手に入れる
subtitles.english:
The happiness that is right there,
I'll fight to get it

subtitles.original: 扉 開く その日まで
subtitles.english: Until the day the door opens

subtitles.original:
Your hope is more than just a place
You're never satisfied
subtitles.english:
Your hope is more than just a place
You're never satisfied

subtitles.original: 進む先は誰かに決められた道じゃなくて
subtitles.english:
The path ahead isn't one decided by
someone else

subtitles.original: 私のモノさ I want be born inside
subtitles.english: It's mine, I want to be born inside

subtitles.original: もう 戻れない
subtitles.english: I can't go back anymore

subtitles.original: Believe that somehow we're alive
subtitles.english: Believe that somehow we're alive
